ygData.subject: Re: Some Orcs can see invisible
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya know, We can t make this game too easy, Perhaps the orcs having seeing invis is a total mystery. Perhaps there is a crypt or a tomb or a wall that tells
ygData.messageBody:
Ya know, We can't make this game too easy,
Perhaps the orcs having seeing invis is a total
mystery. Perhaps there is a crypt or a tomb or a wall
that tells what powers and special things the orcs
were bestowed upon.
The Wanderer
*Something too good, Is not all that fun*

--- XIII <dlepriol@...> wrote:
> From: XIII <dlepriol@...>
>
>
> I know for a fact some dark elves used see invis in
> Nierak. Maybe someone
> was trying to work the kinks out of this one by
> casting it on mobs?.
>
> Ibnabeth/Karana
>
>
> At 16:01 20/05/1999 -0700, you wrote:
> >From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
> >
> >When I've made the scary run from North Ro to the
> innothule swamp
> >(through Oasis and South Ro) I've been invisible
> but there is an orc
> >camp at the south end of Oasis (before zoning to
> South Ro) with Orcs
> >that are ready to attack everytime I go past. The
> main culprit there is
> >an Orc Priest. There are other creatures as well,
> some even blue or
> >green, that see me when invisible. Giant spiders
> for example.
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Manuel Revilla
> [mailto:manuel.revilla@...]
> >Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 2:45 PM
> >To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> >Subject: [eqenchanters] Some Orcs can see invisible
> >
> >
> >From: "Manuel Revilla" <manuel.revilla@...>
> >
> >I can confirm that some Orcs can see invisible. Had
> one charge our group
> >as
> >we where going to purchase more animated sword
> spells and we verified
> >everyone's outdoor camo was still up as the critter
> charged. The
> >question I
> >have is this: Is the Orc seeing invisible due to a
> spell cast by an Orc
> >or
> >by other means (npc's, players, etc.). Just curious
> as to the origin, as
> >I've never seen the source of this irritation.
> Strongly recommend you do
> >not
> >make the trip alone.
> >
> >Manny
> >
> >
>
